tasks.label: Run Tests with Coverage
args: SITE_PACKAGES=$(python -c 'import sysconfig; print(sysconfig.get_paths()["purelib"])') && export PYTHONPATH="$SITE_PACKAGES:$PYTHONPATH" && python -m pytest tests/ --cov=researcharr --cov-report=term-missing --cov-report=html --cov-report=xml
tasks.detail: Runs pytest with coverage matching CI environment (uses site-packages in PYTHONPATH).

tasks.label: Run Current Test File with Coverage
args: SITE_PACKAGES=$(python -c 'import sysconfig; print(sysconfig.get_paths()["purelib"])') && export PYTHONPATH="$SITE_PACKAGES:$PYTHONPATH" && python -m pytest ${file} --cov=researcharr --cov-report=term-missing --cov-report=html --cov-report=xml
tasks.detail: Runs only the currently open test file with coverage matching CI environment.

tasks.label: Run Tests with Coverage (Local Mode)
tasks.detail: Runs pytest with coverage using local source (higher coverage, ~64% vs CI's 59%).

tasks.label: Run Tests (Python 3.10 Docker)
args: docker run --rm -e PYTHONPATH=${workspaceFolder} -v ${workspaceFolder}:/work -w /work python:3.10-slim bash -lc 'pip install -q --no-input -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt pytest >/dev/null && pytest -q'
tasks.detail: Run full test suite under Python 3.10 in docker (includes system sqlite).

tasks.label: Run Targeted Tests (Python 3.10 Docker)
args: docker run --rm -e PYTHONPATH=${workspaceFolder} -v ${workspaceFolder}:/work -w /work python:3.10-slim bash -lc 'pip install -q --no-input -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt pytest >/dev/null && pytest -q ${input:TEST_FILES}'
tasks.detail: Run a subset of tests (prompt for paths) under Python 3.10 via docker.
